entries.content: When a contact has left the company, ask 'Who replaced him?' to get the new contact's name.
entries.notes: A direct clarifying question to overcome the 'person left' obstacle.

entries.content: If there was one thing [related area, e.g., sales training] could do better, what would it be?
entries.notes: Clarifying question to uncover potential pain points or root causes of dissatisfaction/interest.

entries.content: Are they frustrating you? Just be honest, because then I know it's worth calling.
entries.notes: Direct question to discover if there is a root cause (frustration) that makes the sales call relevant.

entries.content: When a contact isn't available, ask clarifying questions about their availability: 'Is he in the office today?', 'When are you expecting him?', 'Is he back next week?'
entries.notes: Isolating the reason for not connecting (availability) and getting information for follow-up.

focus_area: Objection Discovery: Clarifying questions, isolation, root cause
